title: Module 2: Personalizing Your Workspace Quiz
description: Test your knowledge of customizing views, grids, and personal settings in Dynamics 365

questions.question: What is the primary purpose of customizing views in Dynamics 365 for broadcast advertising sales?
options: To change the color scheme of the interface
To display relevant information efficiently and improve productivity
To hide all data from other users
To create backup copies of data
questions.explanation: Customizing views allows sales professionals to display the most relevant information for their specific role and workflow, improving efficiency and productivity by showing only what they need to see.

questions.question: Which of the following can be customized in a Dynamics 365 view?
options: Columns displayed and their order
Sort order and filtering criteria
Column width and formatting
All of the above
questions.explanation: Dynamics 365 views are highly customizable, allowing users to modify columns, their order, sort criteria, filters, column widths, and formatting to create the most useful display for their needs.

questions.question: What is the difference between system views and personal views in Dynamics 365?
options: System views are created by administrators and shared, personal views are created by individual users
System views are faster than personal views
Personal views can only show 5 records at a time
There is no difference between them
questions.explanation: System views are created by administrators and available to all users, while personal views are created by individual users for their own specific needs and are only visible to the creator.

questions.question: In broadcast advertising sales, which columns would be most useful in a leads view?
options: Lead source, company name, contact information, and qualification status
Employee ID, hire date, and salary information
Product inventory and shipping details
Weather forecast and traffic conditions
questions.explanation: For broadcast advertising sales, the most relevant lead information includes where the lead came from, the company name, how to contact them, and their current qualification status in the sales process.

questions.question: How can you save a customized view in Dynamics 365?
options: Views are automatically saved and cannot be customized
Use the 'Save As' option to create a new personal view
Only administrators can save views
Views reset every time you log out
questions.explanation: Users can customize existing views and use the 'Save As' option to create new personal views with their preferred settings, which will be available every time they log in.

questions.question: What is the benefit of using filters in Dynamics 365 views?
options: Filters slow down the system performance
Filters help focus on specific records that meet certain criteria
Filters are only for advanced users
Filters permanently delete unwanted records
questions.explanation: Filters help users focus on specific records that meet certain criteria, such as showing only leads from a particular source or opportunities above a certain value, making it easier to manage large amounts of data.

questions.question: Which of the following is a best practice when creating personal views for broadcast advertising sales?
options: Include as many columns as possible to see all data
Focus on the most relevant information for your specific role and daily tasks
Copy exactly what other team members are using
Never use filters to keep all data visible
questions.explanation: The best practice is to focus on the most relevant information for your specific role and daily tasks, creating views that help you work more efficiently rather than overwhelming you with unnecessary data.

questions.question: How can you modify the sort order in a Dynamics 365 view?
options: Sort order cannot be changed
Click on column headers to sort by that column
Only system administrators can change sort order
Sort order is randomly assigned
questions.explanation: Users can easily change the sort order by clicking on column headers. Clicking once sorts ascending, clicking again sorts descending, and this can be saved as part of a personal view.

questions.question: What happens when you share a personal view with other team members?
options: Personal views cannot be shared
The view becomes available to selected users or teams
Sharing automatically deletes the original view
Only the view name is shared, not the configuration
questions.explanation: Personal views can be shared with other users or teams, making your customized view configuration available to others who might benefit from the same layout and filtering.

questions.question: In the context of broadcast advertising sales, what would be a useful filter for an opportunities view?
options: Show only opportunities with estimated revenue above $10,000
Show only opportunities in specific sales stages
Show only opportunities for certain time periods or campaigns
All of the above
questions.explanation: All of these filters would be useful for broadcast advertising sales professionals to focus on high-value opportunities, track progress through sales stages, or manage seasonal campaigns and specific time periods.

questions.question: What is the advantage of using the 'Recently Viewed' feature in Dynamics 365?
options: It shows a history of recently accessed records for quick navigation
It automatically creates new records
It deletes old records to save space
It only works with system views
questions.explanation: The 'Recently Viewed' feature provides quick access to records you've recently worked with, improving efficiency by allowing you to quickly return to accounts, opportunities, or leads without searching.

questions.question: How can personalizing your Dynamics 365 workspace improve your effectiveness in broadcast advertising sales?
options: It makes the system look more colorful
It reduces the amount of data you can access
It streamlines your workflow by showing relevant information and reducing clicks
It automatically generates more leads
questions.explanation: Personalizing your workspace streamlines your workflow by displaying the most relevant information for your role, reducing the number of clicks needed to access important data, and helping you work more efficiently with your prospects and customers.
